title: Revisions to the 2022 Unified Command Plan
summary: The document titled "2025-04869.pdf" contains a memorandum from the President, dated March 14, 2025, regarding the revisions to the 2022 Unified Command Plan. The President, acting as Commander in Chief, approves and directs the implementation of the revised plan. The Secretary of Defense is instructed to notify Congress of this decision and is authorized to publish the memorandum in the Federal Register. This memorandum signifies a formal update to military command structures and operational strategies, reflecting ongoing adjustments in national defense policy.
